code: import Easing from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Easing";function makeZoomInTranslation(translationType,pivotPoint){const modifier=Math.min(1,Math.max(-1,pivotPoint));return{easing:Easing.bezier(0.175,0.885,0.32,1),0:{opacity:0,scale:0.1,[translationType]:modifier*-1000},0.6:{opacity:1,scale:0.457,[translationType]:pivotPoint},1:{scale:1,[translationType]:0}};}export const zoomIn={from:{opacity:0,scale:0.3},0.5:{opacity:1},to:{opacity:1,scale:1}};export const zoomInDown=makeZoomInTranslation('translateY',60);export const zoomInUp=makeZoomInTranslation('translateY',-60);export const zoomInLeft=makeZoomInTranslation('translateX',10);export const zoomInRight=makeZoomInTranslation('translateX',-10);
